msbt.message: I feel a bit sleep deprived lately. Yaaaawwwn What about you? Are you getting enough sleep?
Probably not.
Yep! Fresh as a daisy!
Oh dear. You're sleepy too!<10_4 /> I always stay up way too late, so today I think I'll go to bed early Of course, I say that every day, and every day I just end up staying up late again Yaaawwwnnn
Must be nice to be so responsible. You're a really good role model.I keep staying up late into the night.<10_4 /> Maybe I should follow your example and try going to bed early tonight.
Well, it seems I'm free next weekend after all. Someone, who shall remain nameless, canceled our plans. What do you do when you suddenly have free time on your hands, ?
I make other plans!
I get housework done.
I retreat to the couch.

No sense crying over canceled plans, you say? Well, bravo! I like your attitude! Why waste a single second on what MIGHT have been when you can focus on what WILL be, instead. I could learn a thing or two from you, !
Why, that's very responsible of you, my dear. And what a fabulous use of time. I've been procrastinating on so many of my own pesky chores, I may have to steal your idea.

No! You just give up and loaf about? But, darling, you mustn't turn into a lazybones! Then again, I suppose one does need time to recharge one's batteries and refresh one's mind. Perhaps unexpected free time is the universe's way of telling us to get in touch with our inner couch potato.
What's the most important thing you take into consideration when you're picking out new clothes?
Price.
Fabric.
Style.
Comfort.

I read somewhere that the way you pick out clothes says a lot about the way others see you. You pick based on value, so I bet that means you have a reputation for being sensible and straightforward. You're probably thought of as a no-nonsense, what-you-see-is- what-you-get type.<10_4 /> I like that!

I read somewhere that the way you pick out clothes says a lot about the way others see you. Fabric is important to you, so I bet people think of you as a substance- over-style type. You probably develop deep, lasting friendships.<10_4 /> What a wonderful ability to have!

I read somewhere that the way you pick out clothes says a lot about the way others see you. You choose based on style, so I bet people see you as someone who's really cool and in tune with trends. You must stand out at work or school, right?<10_4 /> I bet everyone wants to be like you!

I read somewhere that the way you pick out clothes says a lot about the way others see you. Since you picked comfort, I bet you live life at your own pace.You set your own goals and then find the best way to accomplish them.<10_4 /> A strong will is a good way to go!
My dear, I need your opinion on something. And do be honest.When it comes to selecting a home, what is the most important thing to consider?
Size.
Cost.
Location.
The neighbors.

YesI seeand I couldn't agree more!It's tr√®s importante to match the size of one's home to the lifestyle one has become accustomed to. You wouldn't want it to be too small or too big. Just right, as they say.Though, perhaps bigger is better if you want to impress the neighbors. Hee-hee. Not that I care about such shallow things, .

YesI seeand I couldn't agree more, !It IS very important to decide how many Bells one can afford to spend on one's dream home. Especially if one hopes to have Bells left to spend on dream clothes, dream shoes, dream jewelry

YesI seeand I couldn't agree more!Location. Location. Location. I've heard a certain real-estate tycoon we know say that very same thing. I'm not exactly sure, but I think it means you want a home in a fashionable neighborhood. Of course, I would accept nothing less, .

YesI seeand I couldn't agree more, .Having the right neighbors is soooo very important, isn't it? My pearls, don't I know. Of course, if you don't have the right neighbors, having the right fence will do.
When I wear clothes I really like, I just can't help but smile.<10_4 /> Do you really like what you're wearing now?
I sure do!
Not really.
I don't really care.
Well, that outfit certainly does look good on you. Your fashion is going to outshine mine!
Oh my. Really? Well, I think your outfit is sublime, darling.Of course, I'd expect no less from you, !
Could go either way, huh?<10_4 /> Well, watch out! Wear something long enough and it'll grow on you!
